anthar palath kantha wissayi20 krikat tharagawaliye mulika wataye eeye en.si.si.pitiye pawathi awasan tharagawaladi dakunu palath kandayamata erehiwa lakunu 12ka thiyunu jayak wartha kala basnahira kandayama saha eekabaddha kandayamata erehiwa lakunu 53ka jayak athkaragath madhyama palath kandayama awasan purwa watayata sudusukam laba ganimata samathwiya.ee anuwa uthuru mada palath kandayama saha basnahira palath kandayama athara palamu awasan purwa tharagayath, dakunu palath kandayama saha madhyama palath kandayama athara dewani awasan purwa tharagayath ada (30) muwars pitiye di pawathwe.dakunu palath kandayama samaga eeye pawathi tharagayedi palamuwa panduwata paharadun basnahira kandayama oowara 19.3kadi lakunu 105k ras kaleya.

shri lankawa wisin karanu laba athi illima wasara 2028 di eksath jathin wisin nirikshanaya karanu labimata ida atha.ese wuwada jathyanthara kshama aayathanaya madihathwimen niwyok nagaraye pihiti eksath jathinge maha sammelanayedi ratawal 120 k samuhikawa poduwe lokaye siyalu ratawalata balapawathna mema pramada doshaya niwaradi kirimata piyawara ganna lesa yojanawak idiripathwiya.

sigiri koment waladi nama sandahan wethoth koment ekata pera thama nama sandahan kirima sampradayak wi atha.
